overview: Richard Hall is a successful writer, while his wife, Alice, is interested in pursuing a career as a singer. She meets James Hamilton, a musical agent, who arranges an opera engagement with Rimini, an impresario. Hall quarrels with his wife over this, and they separate, with Hall taking their daughter Grace.
tagline: SHOULD A WIFE HAVE A CAREER OF HER OWN OUTSIDE HER HOME?
title: His Greatest Sacrifice
